member.name: IMFTranscodeSinkInfoProvider.GetSinkInfo
member.summary: Gets the media types for the audio and video streams specified in the transcode profile.

param.name: pSinkInfo
param.para: If the method succeeds, the method assigns pointers to the pAudioMediaType and pVideoMediaType members of this structure. The method might set either member to NULL. If either member is non-NULL after the method returns, the caller must release the IMFMediaType pointers.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTranscodeSinkInfoProvider.SetOutputByteStream
member.summary: Sets an output byte stream for the transcode media sink.
member.param: A pointer to the interface of a byte-stream activation object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTranscodeSinkInfoProvider.SetOutputFile
member.summary: Sets the name of the encoded output file.
member.param: Pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the name of the output file.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTranscodeSinkInfoProvider.SetProfile
member.summary: Sets the transcoding profile on the transcode sink activation object.
member.param: A pointer to the interface. To get a pointer to this interface, call .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Implemented by the transcode sink activation object.
The transcode sink activation object can be used to create any of the following file sinks:
